ygData.subject: Re: quest question
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe it has no effect because Murissa has no faction to which she belong, so there is nothing to add to you. ... From: John Kim
ygData.messageBody:
I believe it has no effect because Murissa has no faction to which she
belong, so there is nothing to add to you.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 1:45 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] quest question


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Thu, 17 Jun 1999, Robert "Nokker" Venters wrote:
>
> ummm,, does it work on murissa sandwhisper ,,
> she KOS's me sometimes ,, sometimes she don't ,, I just want to buy water
> without having to run to freeport ,,,

I tried it on her as well. She is dubious to me and refuses
to sell to me. I sang the song and... she was still dubious
and refused to sell to me. Apparently some merchants are
immune to the Jedi mind trick...

Well, at least at our running speed, a trip to Freeport and
back is shorter than a trip to Murissa and back for other
classes...

I tried it on the Erudite merchant behind the orc Ortallis in
South Ro. No change with him as well (which is bad since
AFAIK he is the closest "good" merchant to Guk and generally
gives really really bad prices). Same with the gypsies
(although they already give me the best prices).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
